headline.print_headline: U.N. Climate Change Meeting Opens to New Warnings About Rising Temperatures
headline.content_kicker: I.H.T. Special Report: Business of Green
headline.main: U.N. Climate Talks Promise Little Drama
headline.kicker: I.H.T. Special Report: Business of Green

docs.snippet: The agenda at Doha will focus on firming up pledges that had been negotiated in the summit meetings of the past few years....

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Annual United Nations climate change summit meeting opens in Doha, Qatar, without lofty expectations of recent sessions, which were marked by brinksmanship, breakdowns and weary sense that there has to be better way to tackle warming of planet; delegates in Doha hope to firm up promises made at earlier summits and create concrete means to fulfill them.

byline.contributor:
Nick Cumming-Bruce contributed
reporting from Geneva.

docs.lead_paragraph: The agenda at Doha will focus on firming up pledges that had been negotiated in the summit meetings of the past few years.

headline.print_headline: In Division Races, Parity Takes a Holiday, for Now
headline.seo: In N.F.L. Division Races, Parity Takes Break
headline.main: In Division Races, Parity Takes a Holiday, for Now

docs.snippet: With five games to go in the regular season, no division is tied and the leaders of five of the eight divisions have at least a three-game cushion....
docs.abstract: Judy Battista NFL Fast Forward observes that dominant teams are breaking away in division races this NFL season; notes that with five games to go in regular season, no division is tied and most division leaders have at least a three-game cushion.
docs.lead_paragraph: With five games to go in the regular season, no division is tied and the leaders of five of the eight divisions have at least a three-game cushion.

headline.print_headline: New Sources of Energy Sought for Britain's Future
headline.main: New Sources of Energy Sought for Britain's Future
headline.content_kicker: I.H.T. Special Report: The Business of Green

docs.snippet: A new energy bill is aimed at encouraging investment in new types of power to replace a generation of aging power plants. But experts and officials are split on how best to do this....
docs.lead_paragraph: A new energy bill is aimed at encouraging investment in new types of power to replace a generation of aging power plants. But experts and officials are split on how best to do this.

docs.snippet: Judges generally don’t like it when they are described as political creatures, but there is no getting around it: the party of the president who appoints them is a good predictor of how they will rule....
docs.abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column notes differences exist between Supreme Court Justices  appointed by Republican and Democratic presidents, even if  judges do not like to be described as being influenced by politics.
docs.lead_paragraph: Judges generally don’t like it when they are described as political creatures, but there is no getting around it: the party of the president who appoints them is a good predictor of how they will rule.

headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Cough Syrup Deaths Prompt Inquiry

docs.snippet: The dead were between 20 and 45 years old, and a homicide investigation was opened involving the factory that made the syrup....
docs.abstract: Pakistani police say at least 16 people died in Lahore after drinking toxic cough syrup and that homicide investigation has been opened involving factory where it came from.
docs.lead_paragraph: The dead were between 20 and 45 years old, and a homicide investigation was opened involving the factory that made the syrup.

headline.print_headline: Greek Prosecutors to Review Extremist’s Threat
headline.seo: Prosecutors to Review Video of Threat by Golden Dawn Official
headline.main: Greek Prosecutors to Review Video of Threat by Extremist

docs.snippet: A video showed the spokesman of the right-wing party Golden Dawn threatening the lives of anti-fascist protesters....
docs.abstract: Greek police say video showing Ilias Kasidiaris, spokesman of extremist right-wing party Golden Dawn, threatening lives of anti-fascist protesters at event in Crete has been sent to prosecutors.
docs.lead_paragraph: A video showed the spokesman of the right-wing party Golden Dawn threatening the lives of anti-fascist protesters.

headline.print_headline: In an Answer to China In the Pacific, Japan Flexes Military Muscle
headline.seo: Japan Expands Its Regional Military Role
headline.main: Japan Is Flexing Its Military Muscle to Counter a Rising China

docs.snippet: The pacifist nation of Japan is trying to raise its profile in a new way, offering military aid for the first time in decades and displaying its own armed forces in an effort to build regional alliances....
docs.abstract: Japan is trying to raise its profile by offering military aid for first time in decades and displaying its own armed forces in effort to build regional alliances and shore up other countries' defenses to counter rising China; steps mark significant shift for country, which has resisted repeated calls from United States to become true regional power for fear that it would move too far away from its postwar pacifism.
docs.lead_paragraph: The pacifist nation of Japan is trying to raise its profile in a new way, offering military aid for the first time in decades and displaying its own armed forces in an effort to build regional alliances.

docs.snippet: A bomb was found under the car of Hamid Mir, who hosts one of Pakistan’s most-watched political talk shows....
docs.abstract: Hamid Mir, prominent Pakistani journalist and talk show host, escapes what appears to be assassination attempt after bomb is found under his car; most suspicions point to Pakistani Taliban, though no group has claimed responsibility.
docs.lead_paragraph: A bomb was found under the car of Hamid Mir, who hosts one of Pakistan’s most-watched political talk shows.

headline.seo: Paths Diverge Along Turnpike for Giants and Jets
headline.main: Paths Diverge Along Turnpike for Giants and Jets

docs.snippet: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin’s attention to detail and his consistency tend to make Jets Coach Rex Ryan’s words and actions all the more curious and sloppy....
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column compares New York Jets to New York Giants, tenants in the same building who are miles apart in NFL standings.
docs.lead_paragraph: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin’s attention to detail and his consistency tend to make Jets Coach Rex Ryan’s words and actions all the more curious and sloppy.

headline.print_headline: In Art Prints, Clues To Beetles in Europe
headline.seo: Holes in Art Prints Help Map Beetle Populations in Europe
headline.main: In Art Prints, Clues to Beetles in Europe

docs.snippet: A study of prints from 1462 to 1899 found that wormholes from wood blocks tell a story about the geographic distribution of beetles in Europe....
docs.abstract: Dr Blair Hedges study in journal Biology Letters finds that small holes left by beetles in antique wooden printing blocks tell story about geographic distribution of beetles in Europe.
docs.lead_paragraph: A study of prints from 1462 to 1899 found that wormholes from wood blocks tell a story about the geographic distribution of beetles in Europe.
